snippet.title: ScourgeBringer - Gameplay trailer (All platforms)
snippet.description:
Discover the brand new gameplay trailer of our hectic rogue lite platformer ScourgeBringer by Flying Oak Games, showing what's coming for the release on October 21st!

Preorders are also opened on Nintendo Switch!
Nintendo Switch US: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/scourgebringer-switch/
Nintendo Switch EUR: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/ScourgeBringer-1858310.html

Get the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1037020/ScourgeBringer/

Wishlist the game on Epic: https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/product/scourgebringer/home?lang=en-US

Wishlist the game on GoG: https://www.gog.com/game/scourgebringer

Join Flying Oak Discord to know more about the game’s development:
http://discord.gg/flyingoak
